note: Verified: All arithmetic is correct. H_p(a) = 1/(a-b) and H_p(b) = 1/(b-a) follow directly from Definition 0.4 with n=2. The squaring and summation yielding Phi_2(p) = 2/(b-a)^2 is straightforward. The edge case a=b is properly excluded by the hypothesis a < b (i.e., p in P_2). Same reasoning applies to q.
